titles.title: There's A Man In The Glory (familiar hymn of t

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me He's pure and He's holy Triumphant and free He's wise and He's loving How tender is He{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His Life in the glory My life must be His Life in the glory My life must be There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me He overcame Satan From bondage He's free In Life he is reigning How kingly is He His life in the glory My life must be His life in the glory My life must be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me In Him is no sickness No weakness has He He's strong and in vigor How buoyant is He His life in the glory My life may be His life in the glory My life may be{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There's a Man in the glory Whose Life is for me His peace is abiding How patient is He He's joyful and radiant Expecting to see His life in the glory Lived out in me His life in the glory Lived out in me{/lang-eng}
